amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Homeland Security Secretary Mayorkas to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
